sect1.title: General
sect1.para: The component ZVAD (ZK-Adapter) is an additional wrapper extending the functionality of ZV module. Is an extension of CDL(ZV) making possible the communication between it, DIeTa and WFS. This component covers the functionality not delivered by CARIAD component CDL(ZV).

Note: other SWCs are those components that ZVAD interacts with, for more details, see VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ApplicationLayer.ZV_Lib.SW Architecture.ZVAD.SW Architecture.Static.ZVAD Context
